item.name: Profile
Update user profile

response.name: Update User Profile with image
response.body:
{
    "user": {
        "_id": "67547cb81e777594c8e7bc08",
        "username": "admin",
        "password": "$2b$10$8r6mbgSDRQ3ilgP.c/d1aOPWVIBjkzvMhEgbDFv1Rr92ygf6tjswq",
        "email": "admin@gmail.com",
        "firstName": "Admin",
        "lastName": "One",
        "hastoken": true,
        "role": "admin",
        "bio": "Esta es mi nueva biografia",
        "profileImage": "/public/images/profiles/default-profile.png",
        "isVerified": true,
        "verificationToken": null,
        "createdAt": "2024-12-07T16:50:00.201Z",
        "__v": 0
    },
    "message": "User updated successfully"
}
